stf:test.name: fadc_fe_pulser
stf:test.description: Test the STF FADC FE PULSER

inputParameter.description: 10 bit DAC setting for FADC reference voltage
inputParameter.name: fadc_reference_dac

inputParameter.description: 12Bit DAC setting for atwd pedestal voltage
inputParameter.name: atwd_pedestal_dac

inputParameter.description: pulser amplitude in uV (at PMT input) 5000=5mV ~ 1 SPE
inputParameter.name: pulser_amplitude_uvolt

inputParameter.description: Number of waveforms to take and average over before analysis.
inputParameter.name: loop_count

outputParameter.description: First value of the SPE DAC that was above noise(of 10bit)if no trigger point then use last tried point
outputParameter.name: triggerable_spe_dac

outputParameter.description: Mean of the raw FADC baseline values (before baseline subtraction)
outputParameter.name: fadc_baseline_mean

outputParameter.description: Amplitude of the positive going pulse (in FADC count units.)
outputParameter.name: fadc_fe_pulser_amplitude

outputParameter.description: Width of the positive going pulse ( in FADC samples = 2x clock counts).
outputParameter.name: fadc_fe_pulser_width

outputParameter.description: Position of the triggered positive going pulse (in FADC samples - 2x clock counts).
outputParameter.name: fadc_fe_pulser_position

outputParameter.description: Average waveform FADC baseline values in ATWD counts units.
outputParameter.name: fadc_fe_pulser_waveform
